comments: The following skins array defines all available skins and their configuration.
name: name of the skin (directory name: /skins/name)
refreshDelay: dashboard refresh delay (between API calls) in milliseconds
animationFps: desired dashboard animation in frames per second (if your device is capable you may set higher values)
width: width of the skin in pixels (same as defined in the CSS)
height: height of the skin in pixels (same as defined in the CSS)
